name: Kinniku Banzuke Vol.2 - Aratanaru Genkai E No Chousen
name_original: Kinniku Banzuke Vol.2 - Aratanaru Genkai E No Chousen
description:
Kinniku Banzuke (Muscle Ranking), an enormously popular program that aired weekly between 1995 and 2002, and Sasuke, a twice-a-year special that’s still going strong.

The premise of Kinniku Banzuke, as reflected in several Muscle Park games, is simple. Competitors must knock down nine numbered plates of a target using various sports apparatus, including Frisbees, baseballs and darts. Participants on the show included top athletes and qualified amateurs.

Events:
Punch-Out
9 hoops
Beach Flags
the Gallon Throw
50M Backflip
Spray hitter
Game Maker
Dead Man's Drop
Long Shoot

Manufacturer's description:

Into 2nd game of "ranking" Muscle popular TV show from the top athlete to compete for the limit, such as strength, agility. Recorded all nine competitions such as the "Beach Flags" and "The Slow gallon." Ruy Ramos add faces, Koji Akiyama, and Kimiyasu Kudo players also participated. Mr. Ichiro commentary Furudate'll liven up the familiar game further.

Features:
Third person perspective.
3D graphics
Cartoon graphics
Muscle Ranking theme.
